mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Request (title, body, price, memberId, designBoardId) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{price}, #{memberId}, #{designBoardId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.memberId, r.title, r.price, r.inserted FROM Request r JOIN DesignBoard db ON r.designBoardId = db.id JOIN Member m ON m.id = db.memberId WHERE m.id = db.memberId ORDER BY r.id DESC
